summary: Successfully tested BTC Signal Snapshot Writer functionality - all core requirements working correctly on local backend

flaky_endpoints.workaround: Use local backend endpoint (localhost:8002) which works perfectly

infrastructure_issues.issue: Occasional port conflicts causing crashes and restarts
infrastructure_issues.impact: Temporary service interruption during port conflicts

passed_tests: ✅ POST write-btc (first call) - writes 3 presets correctly
✅ GET latest?symbol=BTC - returns found:true with snapshot data
✅ GET count?symbol=BTC - shows active and shadow counts
✅ Error handling and response format validation
action_item_for_main_agent: Investigate CloudFlare/external URL routing issue causing 520 errors on POST requests. Local backend functionality is perfect - the issue is with external proxy configuration.
